comments:
Sometimes I get the following exception that hangs eclipse - I have to do a force quit. I cannot tell you under what circumstances this happens but it tends to happen when I switch a perspective.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Jul 07, 2002 19:42:43.844
!MESSAGE Unhandled exception caught in event loop.

ok, it seems that doing just about anything in the resource perspective causes this bug. I have tried closing views, resizing columns in the task view, expanding/collapsing nodes in the Navigator tree - all result in the exception.

I tried closing the perspective and adding it back again but it didn't help.

This bug only surfaced after using Eclipse for a few days so it wasn't something that manifested itself immediately.
I cannot reproduce this problem in the latest builds. Can you?

Hi Andre,
I haven't had much opportunity to try the latest build in earnest but so far I haven't seen it. Perhaps its fixed?

Channing
I haven't had a repeat of this bug so I believe it must be fixed.
